The adventurers confront a villain and a group of minions in a battle to the finish.
The adventurers chase a villain while dodging obstacles designed to thwart them, leading to a final confrontation in the villain’s refuge.
The actions of the adventurers or a villain result in a cataclysmic event that the adventurers must escape.
The adventurers race to the site where a villain is bringing a master plan to its conclusion, arriving just as that plan is about to be completed.
A villain and two or three lieutenants perform separate rites in a large room. The adventurers must disrupt all the rites.
An ally betrays the adventurers as they’re about to achieve their goal. (Use this climax carefully, and don’t overuse it.)
A portal opens to another plane of existence. Creatures on the other side spill out, forcing the adventurers to close the portal while dealing with a villain at the same time.
The dungeon begins to collapse while a villain attempts to escape in the chaos.
The adventurers must choose whether to pursue a fleeing villain or save an NPC they care about or a group of innocents.
Just when the characters think the main threat is defeated, it transforms into a different monster or a more powerful form.
Introduce a person, an object, or information that the characters need to transport safely to a location involved in the new adventure.

Have a major villain flee to a location that features in the new adventure. The characters might be able to pursue the villain, or they might have to search for clues about where the villain has gone.
Introduce clues suggesting that a villain or another NPC in this adventure is part of a larger group—a group that features prominently in the new adventure.
Introduce a villainous group that’s featured in the new adventure by having its agents spy on or interfere with the characters’ activities.
Have travelers bring news of events transpiring elsewhere, leading characters toward the new adventure.
Give the characters a treasure that’s wrapped in mystery they’ll need to unravel in the new adventure.
The leak in the roof has been fixed.
One of your hirelings adopted a stray dog.
You received a lovely letter from a friend.
Some practical joker has been putting rotten eggs in people’s boots.
Random location on the plane you named

Random location on an Inner Plane determined by rolling [[/r 1d6]]: on a 1 , the Plane of Air; on a 2 , the Plane of Earth; on a 3 , the Plane of Fire; on a 4 , the Plane of Water; on a 5 , the Feywild; on a 6 , the Shadowfell

Random location on an Outer Plane determined by rolling [[/r 1d8]]: on a 1 , Arborea; on a 2 , Arcadia; on a 3 , the Beastlands; on a 4 , Bytopia; on a 5 , Elysium; on a 6 , Mechanus; on a 7 , Mount Celestia; on an 8 , Ysgard

Random location on an Outer Plane determined by rolling [[/r 1d8]]: on a 1 , the Abyss; on a 2 , Acheron; on a 3 , Carceri; on a 4 , Gehenna; on a 5 , Hades; on a 6 , Limbo; on a 7 , the Nine Hells; on an 8 , Pandemonium
Random location on the Astral Plane
Uses an elegant mobility device (wheelchair, brace, or cane)
Ring of Elemental Command (air, earth, fire, or water)

original: [[/r 5d4#Toadstools]] toadstools sprout. If a creature eats a toadstool, roll [[/r 1d2#Toadstool side-effect]]{any die}. On an odd roll, the eater must succeed on a [[/save ability=con dc=15 format=long]] or take [[/damage 5d6 type=poison]] damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 hour. On an even roll, the eater gains [[/healing 5d6 type=temphp]] for 1 hour.
A geyser erupts and spouts water, beer, mayonnaise, tea, vinegar, wine, or oil (DM’s choice) 30 feet into the air for [[/r 1d4#Geyser duration (minutes)]] minutes.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.NB6wUgVqeOQtsQKu]{Treant} sprouts. Roll [[/r 1d2#Treant alignment]]{any die}. On an odd roll, the treant is Chaotic Evil. On an even roll, the treant is Chaotic Good.

An animate but immobile stone statue in your likeness rises and makes verbal threats against you. If you leave it and others come near, it describes you as the most heinous of villains and directs the newcomers to find and attack you. If you are on the same plane of existence as the statue, it knows where you are. The statue becomes inanimate after 24 hours.
A campfire with green flames springs forth and burns for 24 hours or until it is extinguished.

[[/r 1d4 + 4#Bright-pink toads]] bright-pink @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobFrog000000]{toads} crawl forth. Whenever a toad is touched, it transforms into a Large or smaller monster of the DM’s choice that acts in accordance with its alignment and nature. The monster remains for 1 minute, then disappears in a puff of bright-pink smoke.
A hungry @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.1ES45ODWg3pCrkzv]{Bulette} burrows up and attacks.

A fruit tree grows. It has [[/r 1d10 + 20#Pieces of fruit]] fruit, [[/gmr 1d8#Fruits acting as Potions]] of which act as randomly determined potions. The tree vanishes after 1 hour. Picked fruit remains, retaining any magic for 30 days.

A nest of [[/r 1d4 + 3#Rainbow-colored eggs]] rainbow-colored eggs springs up. Any creature that eats an egg makes a [[/save ability=con dc=20 format=long]]. On a successful save, a creature permanently increases its lowest ability score by 1, randomly choosing among equally low scores. On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage 10d6 type=force]] damage from an internal explosion.

A pyramid with a 60-foot-square base bursts upward. Inside is a burial chamber containing a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.t8WYD7ak07X7xpx8]{Mummy} , a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.UFW8M3JHzHkxUEGM]{Mummy Lord} , or some other Undead of the DM’s choice. Its sarcophagus contains treasure of the DM’s choice.
A giant beanstalk sprouts, growing to a height of the DM’s choice. The top leads where the DM chooses, such as to a great view, a cloud giant’s castle, or another plane of existence.

The item communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it<.
The item speaks one or more languages.
The item speaks one or more languages. In addition, the item can communicate telepathically with any creature that carries or wields it.
Aberration. The item is ancient. At a glance, it seems to be covered with mucus.
Celestial. The item is half the normal weight and inscribed with feathered wings, suns, and stars. Fiends find it repulsive.
Devotees of Lolth. The item is half the normal weight. It is inscribed with spiders and webs in honor of Lolth.
Dragon. This item incorporates precious metals and gems from a dragon’s hoard. It grows warm when within 120 feet of a Dragon.
Dwarf. The item is durable and has Dwarvish runes worked into its design. It might be associated with a clan that would like to see it returned to their ancestral halls.
Elemental Air. The item is half the normal weight and feels hollow. If it’s made of fabric, it is diaphanous.
Elemental Earth. This item might be crafted from stone. Any cloth or leather elements are studded with finely polished rock.
Elemental Fire. This item is warm to the touch, and any metal parts are crafted from black iron. Flame imagery covers its surface.
Elemental Water. Lustrous fish scales replace leather or cloth on this item, and seashells and worked coral (as hard as any metal) replace metal portions.
Elf. The item is half the normal weight. It is adorned with symbols of nature: leaves, vines, stars, and the like.

Fey. The item is exquisitely crafted from the finest materials and glows with a pale radiance in moonlight, shedding Dim Light in a 5-foot radius. Any metal in the item is silver or mithral rather than iron or steel.

Fiend. The item is made of iron or horn, and any cloth or leather components are crafted from the hide of Fiends. Leering faces or vile runes are engraved on its surface. Celestials find it repulsive.
Giant. The item is larger than normal and was crafted by Giants for use by their smaller allies.
Gnome. The item is crafted to appear ordinary and well used. It could also incorporate gears and mechanical components, even if these aren’t essential to its function.

Human. The item was created during the heyday of a fallen human kingdom, or it is tied to a human of legend. It might hold writing in a forgotten language or symbols whose significance is lost to the ages.
Undead. The item incorporates symbols of death, such as bones and skulls, and it might be crafted from parts of corpses. It feels cold to the touch.
A key figure died; murder is suspected.
War brews between rival guilds or gangs.
Monsters attack anyone who approaches or leaves the settlement.
A prophecy of doom has residents on edge.
Locals are being drafted to fight in a war.
Stat blocks for these creatures (except the card drawer) appear in the Monster Manual.
translation: 除抽牌者以外的生物数据在 怪物图鉴 中均有展示。
万象无常牌：22 张牌组
万象无常牌：22 张牌组

original: Lots of gardens, parks, and greenery
Lots of mud, filth, and litter
Noise and smoke from smithies and forges
Cliffs on one or more sides
Impressive structure (such as a keep, temple, circle of standing stones, or ziggurat)
Perilous. The area is dangerously worn and prone to collapse. Any impacts or damage to the structure, including from spells and other areas of effect, have a 50 percent chance of causing a collapse.
Crumbling. Areas within the dungeon section are choked with rubble and have a 50 percent chance of being &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. &Reference[Half Cover] and hiding places are plentiful.

Neglected. One dungeon hazard—such as brown mold, green slime, or yellow mold (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7]{Hazards})—is abundant.
Abandoned. Most of the dungeon is deserted. Dexterity (Stealth) checks have Disadvantage because any sounds stand out as unusual.
Secure. Ability checks made to break down doors, open locks, or carry out similar activities have Disadvantage.
Thriving. The dungeon is heavily populated. Any loud noises draw the attention of nearby creatures.
Abandoned after internal strife devastated its population
Abandoned because the site was cursed by a god or other powerful entity
Abandoned by its original creators when a plague spread through the dungeon
Amazingly well preserved ancient city inside a dome encased in volcanic ash, submerged underwater, or entombed in desert sands
Built as a fortress guarding a mountain pass
Built as a maze, either to protect treasure from intruders or as a gauntlet where prisoners were hunted by monsters
Built as a stronghold but abandoned after it fell to invaders
Built as a treasure vault to protect powerful magic items and great wealth
Built beneath a city in catacombs or sewers
Built beneath or on top of a mesa or several connected mesas
Built by a religious group to serve as a temple and linked to the energy of other planes of existence
Built by dwarves and decorated with enormous dwarven faces that have been defaced by its current inhabitants
Built in or among the branches of a tree
Built to house a planar portal but abandoned when creatures or energy from the other side of the portal seeped into the dungeon
Carved into a meteorite (before or after it fell to earth)
Caverns carved by a beholder’s disintegration eye ray, with unnaturally smooth walls and vertical shafts connecting different levels
Contains something that led to the downfall of its creators or inhabitants
Dug as a burrow by a monster that might still live inside
Intended as a death trap to eliminate any creature that enters, perhaps to guard a treasure or to harvest souls for a necromantic rite
Long known as the site of a great miracle or another auspicious event
Made by amphibious creatures (such as kuo-toa or aboleths), using water to protect the innermost reaches from air-breathing intruders
Made by a powerful spellcaster (perhaps a lich) as a site for magical research and experimentation
Made by giants at a vast scale
Natural caverns featuring a range of strikingly beautiful rock and crystal formations
On an island in an underground sea
On the back of a Gargantuan creature
Originally constructed as a mine but abandoned when tunnels connected to dangerous Underdark tunnels
Secreted away in a demiplane or in a pocket dimension
Slowly abandoned as its creators died out or migrated away
Transformed by multiple events or disasters over the course of centuries
The first time the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEfreetiBottle]{bottle} is opened, the DM rolls on the following table to determine what happens.
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgEfreetiBottle]{瓶子} 第一次被打开时，DM按下面的表格掷骰，以此来决定会发生什么。

original: The efreeti attacks you. After fighting for 5 rounds, the efreeti disappears, and the bottle loses its magic.
translation: 火巨灵攻击你。战斗进行 5 轮后，火巨灵将消失，同时瓶子将失去魔力。

original: The efreeti understands your languages and obeys your commands for 1 hour, after which it returns to the bottle, and a new stopper contains it. The stopper can’t be removed for 24 hours. The next two times the bottle is opened, the same effect occurs. If the bottle is opened a fourth time, the efreeti escapes and disappears, and the bottle loses its magic.
translation: 在接下来的 1 小时内，火巨灵理解你的语言并遵循你的命令。在这之后它会重新回到瓶中，而一个新的瓶塞将显现并再次将其封印，且新瓶塞在 24 小时内都无法被拔出。下两次打开瓶子时会产生同样的效应。当瓶子第四次被打开时，火巨灵将逃走并消失，同时瓶子将失去魔力。

original: The efreeti understands your languages and can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} once for you. It disappears when it grants the wish or after 1 hour, and the bottle loses its magic.
translation: 火巨灵理解你的语言并能为你施展一次@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000] 。它将在 1 小时后或施放完祈愿术时消失，同时瓶子将失去魔力。

original: Extended journey. Each character in a group traveling together makes a [[/save cha 15]] saving throw. If at least half the group succeeds, travel is delayed by [[/r 1d10]] hours. Otherwise, the journey’s travel time is doubled.
Hurled to a random destination on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgCosmology0000.JournalEntryPage.lNqkZFfXDs9S3sft]{Astral Plane}
Plane: Elemental Plane of Air. Curtain Color: Pale blue
Plane: Elemental Plane of Earth. Curtain Color: Chestnut
Plane: Elemental Plane of Fire. Curtain Color: Orange
Plane: Elemental Plane of Water. Curtain Color: Green
Plane: Para-elemental Plane of Ash. Curtain Color: Dark gray
Plane: Para-elemental Plane of Ice. Curtain Color: Aquamarine
Plane: Para-elemental Plane of Magma. Curtain Color: Maroon
Plane: Para-elemental Plane of Ooze. Curtain Color: Chocolate

The guest is an individual of great renown who stays for 7 days. At the end of their stay, the guest gives you a letter of recommendation (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.XpmEG4yalu71L9ed]{Marks of Prestige}).
The guest requests sanctuary while avoiding persecution for their beliefs or crimes. They depart 7 days later, but not before offering you a gift of [[/award 1d6*100gp]].
The guest is a mercenary, giving you one additional Bastion Defender. The guest doesn’t require a facility to house them, and they stay until you send them away or they’re killed.

The guest is a Friendly monster, such as a brass dragon or a treant. If your Bastion is attacked while this monster is your guest, it defends your Bastion, and you lose no Bastion Defenders. The monster leaves after it defends your Bastion once or when you send it away.
The characters find a letter describing the adventure situation.
The characters are on an unrelated quest, such as searching for a particular magic item, that leads them into the adventure situation.
The adventure situation disrupts a festival or ceremony that the characters are attending.
A magical mishap places the characters in the adventure situation.
While traveling in a caravan or aboard a ship, the characters befriend an NPC who has news about the adventure situation.
The characters are attacked after being mistaken for another group of adventurers. They learn about the adventure situation from a clue left behind by their attackers.

You cast a random spell determined by rolling [[/r 1d10]]: on a 1, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]{Enlarge/Reduce} (enlarge effect); on a 2, Enlarge/Reduce (reduce effect); on a 3, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}; on a 4, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball}; on a 5, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}; on a 6, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (cast on yourself); on a 7, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}; on an 8, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbPhantasmalFor]{Phantasmal Force}; on a 9, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]{Polymorph}; on a 10, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStinkingCl]{Stinking Cloud}.
You have the &Reference[Stunned] condition until the end of your next turn, believing something awesome just happened.
A harmless swarm of butterflies fills a 10-foot Cube within 30 feet of yourself. The swarm disperses after 1 minute.

You pull a nonmagical object out of the hat. Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine the object: on a 1, a vial of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAcid0000000]{Acid}; on a 2, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagAlchemistsF]{flask of Alchemist’s Fire}; on a 3, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}; on a 4, a lit @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torch}.
You suffer a bout of “magic sickness” and have the &Reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 hour.
You have the &Reference[Petrified] condition until the end of your next turn.

You pull a nonmagical object out of the hat. Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine the object: on a 1, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Dagger}; on a 2, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope} with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagGrapplingHo]{Grappling Hook} tied to one end; on a 3, a bag of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaltrops000]{Caltrops}; on a 4, a gem worth 50 GP.

A creature appears in an unoccupied space as close to you as possible. The creature isn’t under your control and acts as it normally would, and it disappears after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine the creature: on a 1, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobCamel00000]{Camel}; on a 2, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobConstricto]{Constrictor Snake}; on a 3, an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobElephant00]{Elephant}; on a 4, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbmobMule000000]{Mule}.
A Hostile @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.PcZ0QjIG6bHpffp9]{Swarm of Bats} flies out of the hat, occupies your space, and attacks you.

A vertical, 10-foot-diameter, two-way portal to another plane of existence opens in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you and remains open until the end of your next turn. The DM determines where it leads.

You pull a magic item out of the hat. Roll [[/r 1d6]] to determine the item’s rarity: on a 1–3, Common; on a 4–5, Uncommon; on a 6, Rare. The DM chooses the item, which disappears after 1 hour if it’s not consumed or destroyed before then.
Arcane. This item was created for an ancient order of spellcasters and bears the order’s symbol.
Bane. This item was created to oppose creatures of a particular type, such as Aberrations or Dragons.
Heroic. A great hero once wielded this item. Anyone who knows the item’s history expects great deeds from the new owner.
Ornament. The item honors a special event. Inset gemstones, gold or platinum inlays, and gold or silver filigree adorn its surface.
Prophecy. The item features in a prophecy: its bearer is destined to play a key role in future events.
Religious. This item was used in religious ceremonies dedicated to a particular deity. It has religious symbols worked into it.
Sinister. This item is linked to a deed of great evil, such as a massacre or an assassination. It might have a name or be closely associated with a villain who used it.
Symbol of Power. This item was once used as part of royal regalia or as a badge of high office.

key: entries->Horn of Valhalla: Type and Requirement->results->91-100
original: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIronHornOfVal]{Iron} (5 spirits); Proficiency with all Martial weapons
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgIronHornOfVal]{黑铁} （5 英灵）；熟练于所有军用武器

original: An Indifferent Giant Ape protects its territory; its primary concern is getting the party to leave.
A Hostile Tyrannosaurus Rex is on the hunt and tries to eat the characters.
Three Allosauruses are hunting in the jungle; they are Hostile and treat the party as prey.
Two Ankylosauruses tromp through the forest nearby. They are territorial and aggressive but Indifferent, and they won’t pursue a fleeing party.
A band of humans, including a Veteran Warrior and eight Infantry Warriors, watch the party. They are Indifferent; they live in the jungle and aren’t used to seeing other people.
Four Minotaurs of Baphomet prowl the jungle looking for Humanoids they can capture and bring back to the temple.
Instrument of the Bards (Canaith mandolin or Cli lyre)
translation: 吟游诗人乐器（卡奈斯曼陀林或克里里拉琴）

夸尔羽符（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBirdQuaalsFea]{鸟}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSwanBoatQuaal]{天鹅船} 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgWhipQuaalsFea]{鞭}）

original: Instrument of the Bards (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgDossLuteInstr]{Doss lute}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgFochlucanBand]{Fochlucan bandore}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMacfuirmidhCi]{Mac-Fuirmidh cittern})
A dragon wyrmling has gathered a band of kobolds to help it amass a hoard.
translation: 一头雏龙召集了一群狗头人来为它囤积秘宝。

original: Wererats living in a city’s sewers plot to take control of the governing council.
translation: 一群栖身于城市下水道中的鼠人密谋要接管城市理事会。

original: Bandit activity signals efforts to revive an evil cult long ago driven from the region.
translation: 强盗近期的活动揭示出一个早已被赶出该地区的邪恶教团即将卷土重来。

original: A pack of gnolls is rampaging dangerously close to local farmlands.
translation: 一群危险的豺狼人正在当地的农田附近肆虐。

original: A rivalry between two merchant families escalates from mischief to mayhem.
translation: 一对商贾世家竞争对手的矛盾从小打小闹升级为了一场骚乱。

original: A new sinkhole has revealed a long-buried dungeon thought to hold treasure.
translation: 一个新坑洞的出现带出了一个埋藏已久的地城，据说里面埋藏着宝藏。

original: Miners discovered an underground ruin and were captured by monsters living there.
translation: 一群发现了一座地下废墟的矿工被栖息在那里的怪物抓走了。

original: An innocent person is being framed for the crimes of a shape-shifting monster.
translation: 一群食尸鬼在夜里爬出了墓穴。

original: Ghouls are venturing out of the catacombs at night.
translation: 一群食尸鬼在夜里爬出了墓穴。

original: A notorious criminal hides from the law in an old ruin or abandoned mine.
translation: 一个臭名昭著的罪犯为了逃避法律的制裁，藏身在了一个古老的废墟或废弃的矿井中。

original: A contagion in a forest is causing spiders to grow massive and become aggressive.
translation: 一种肆虐于森林中的疫病正在将蜘蛛们变得巨大且极具攻击性。

original: To take revenge against a village for an imagined slight, a necromancer has been animating the corpses in the village cemetery.
translation: 一个死灵师为了报复村里人对他的轻视，正在将村庄墓地中的尸体活化。

original: An evil cult is spreading in a village. Those who oppose the cult are marked for sacrifice.
translation: 一个邪教组织正在一个村庄里兴风作浪。那些忤逆他们的人都被当做了祭品。

original: An abandoned house on the edge of town is haunted by Undead because of a cursed item in the house.
translation: 一栋小镇边陲的废弃房屋正在因屋内的一件诅咒物品而受到不死生物的侵扰。

original: Creatures from the Feywild enter the world and cause mischief and misfortune among villagers and their livestock.
translation: 来自妖精荒野的生物闯入了这个世界，给许多村民和牲畜招致了灾祸和不幸。

original: A hag’s curse is making animals unusually aggressive.
translation: 一个鬼婆的诅咒正在将动物们变得异常具有攻击性。

original: Bullies have appointed themselves the village militia and are extorting money and food from villagers.
translation: 一群恶棍自封为村里的民兵，正在向村民勒索钱财和食物。

original: After a local fisher pulls a grotesque statue from the sea, aquatic monsters start attacking the waterfront at night.
translation: 在一个当地渔民将一尊诡异雕像拉上岸后，水生的怪物们就开始在夜间袭击海岸。

original: The ruins on the hill near the village lie under a curse, so people don’t go there—except a scholar who wants to study the ruins.
translation: 小镇旁山丘上的废墟正处于诅咒之中，因此人们不会前往那里——除了一位打算研究遗迹的学者。

original: A new captain has taken charge of a band of pirates or bandits and started raiding more frequently.
translation: 一群栖身于城市下水道中的鼠人密谋要接管城市理事会。

original: A portal to the Abyss opens in a cursed location and spews demons into the world.
translation: 通往深渊的传送门于诅咒之地开启，恶魔从中倾巢而出。

original: A band of hunting giants has driven its prey—enormous beasts—into pastureland.
translation: 一群狩猎中的巨人把它们的猎物——一群无比巨大的野兽——赶入了一个牧场。

original: An adult dragon’s lair is transforming an expanse into an environment inhospitable to the other creatures living there.
translation: 邪教徒妄图说服一头龙接受他们的仪式，并将其变为一个龙巫妖。

original: A long-lost journal describes an incredible journey to a hidden subterranean realm full of magical wonders.
translation: 邪教徒妄图说服一头龙接受他们的仪式，并将其变为一个龙巫妖。

original: Cultists hope to persuade a dragon to undergo the rite that will transform it into a dracolich.
translation: 邪教徒妄图说服一头龙接受他们的仪式，并将其变为一个龙巫妖。

original: The ruler of the realm is sending an emissary to a hostile neighbor to negotiate a truce, and the emissary needs protection.
translation: 国度的统治者正在派遣使者前往敌对的邻国商谈停战事宜，而这位大使需要有人来保护他。

original: A castle or city has been drawn into another plane of existence.
translation: 一座城堡或城市被拖入了另一个存在位面。

original: A storm tears across the land, with a mysterious flying citadel in the eye of the storm.
translation: 一场风暴席卷了大地，而在风暴的中心有一座神秘的飞行城堡。

original: Two parts of a magic item are in the hands of bitter enemies; the third piece is lost.
translation: 一个魔法物品的两个部件落在了一对仇敌手里，而第三个部件则遗失了。

original: Evil cultists gather from around the world to summon a monstrous god or alien entity.
translation: 邪恶的教徒从全世界聚集到一起，想要召唤一个恐怖神明或异域存在的实体。

original: A tyrannical ruler outlaws the use of magic without official sanction. A secret society of spellcasters seeks to oust the tyrant.
translation: 一位暴君禁止魔法在未经官方批准的情况下使用。而一个由施法者组成的秘密组织正在试图推翻这位暴君。

original: During a drought, low water levels in a lake reveal previously unknown ancient ruins that contain a powerful evil.
translation: 在一场大旱期间，一个水位降低的湖泊揭露出了一座不为人知的古代遗迹，其中蕴藏着强大的邪恶力量。

original: An ancient dragon is scheming to destroy a god and take the god’s place in the pantheon. The dragon’s minions are searching for Artifacts that can summon and weaken this god.
translation: 一头远古龙正在暗中计划毁灭一位神明，并取代他在神系中的位置。巨龙的爪牙正在寻找能够召唤和削弱这位神明的神器。

original: A band of giants drove away a metallic dragon and took over the dragon’s lair, and the dragon wants to reclaim the lair.
translation: 一群巨人赶走了一头金属龙，占领了它的巢穴，而巨龙想要夺回巢穴。

original: An ancient hero returns from the dead to prepare the world for the return of an equally ancient monster.
translation: 一位远古时期的英雄从死亡中归来，他在为世界做好准备，来迎接一个和他同样古老的怪物的归来。

original: An ancient Artifact has the power to defeat or imprison a rampaging titan.
translation: 一件上古神器拥有着足以击败或囚禁一个暴走的泰坦的力量。

original: A god of agriculture is angry, causing rivers to dry up and crops to wither.
translation: 一位农业之神陷入了愤怒，致使河流干涸、作物枯萎。

original: An Artifact belonging to a god falls into mortal hands.
translation: 一件原本属于一位神明的神器落入了一个凡人的手中。

original: A titan imprisoned in the Underdark begins to break free, causing terrible earthquakes that are only a hint of the destruction that the titan will cause if it is released.
translation: 一个被囚禁于幽暗地域中的泰坦正在挣脱束缚，这引发了剧烈的地震，如果他被释放出来，这将只是泰坦会造成的破坏中的九牛一毛。

original: A lich tries to exterminate any spellcasters that approach the lich’s level of power.
translation: 一个巫妖在试图消灭任何接近他实力的施法者。

original: A holy temple was built around a portal leading to one of the Lower Planes to prevent any evil from passing through in either direction. Now the temple has come under siege from both directions.
translation: 从前有一座圣殿被建在了通往一个下层位面的传送门周围，它是被用来防止任何邪恶力量从任一位面穿过传送门而存在的。而现在，圣殿已经受到了来自双向的围攻。

original: Five ancient metallic dragons lair in the Pillars of Creation. If all these dragons are killed, the world will collapse into chaos. One has just been slain.
translation: 有五条古老的金属龙在创生之柱中筑巢。如果这些龙被杀死，世界将真正地崩溃，陷入混沌。而现在其中一头已经被杀。

original: A group of cultists has summoned a demon to wreak havoc in the city.
translation: 一群邪教徒召唤了一只恶魔，并在城市中制造混乱。

original: A rebel lures monsters to the cause with the promise of looting the king’s treasury.
translation: 反叛军引来了怪物，意图掠夺王之宝库。

original: An evil Artifact has transformed a forest into a dismal swamp full of horrific monsters.
translation: 一件邪恶的神器将一片森林变为了一片死气沉沉、充满恐怖怪物的沼泽。

original: An Aberration living in the Underdark sends minions to capture people from the surface to turn those people into new minions.
translation: 一只栖息在幽暗地域的异怪将它的仆从送上地表，并在地表捕捉普通人，将他们变为自己新的仆从。

original: A monster (perhaps a devil, slaad, or hag) is impersonating a prominent noble to throw the realm into civil war.
translation: 一只怪物（也许是一只魔鬼，史拉蟾，或者鬼婆）假冒成了一名声名显赫的贵族，以将它所在的国家推入内战。

original: A master thief plans to steal royal regalia.
translation: 一个本该作为守卫存在的魔像突然暴走并挟持了它的制作者。

original: A golem intended to serve as a protector has gone berserk and captured its creator.
translation: 一个本该作为守卫存在的魔像突然暴走并挟持了它的制作者。

original: A conspiracy of spies, assassins, and necromancers schemes to overthrow a ruler.
translation: 一群间谍、刺客和死灵师正在合谋推翻一位统治者。

original: After establishing a lair, a young dragon is trying to earn the fear and respect of other creatures living nearby.
translation: 一头建立了巢穴的青年龙试图向居住在周边地区的生物散播恐惧并收获敬畏。

original: The approach of a lone giant alarms the people of a town, but the giant is simply looking for a place to live in peace.
translation: 一个孤单的巨人的到来惊动了小镇上的人们，但这个巨人其实只是在寻找一个安居之所。

original: An enormous monster on display in a menagerie breaks free and goes on a rampage.
translation: 一头被圈养起来的巨大怪物挣脱了樊笼并陷入了暴走。

original: A coven of hags steals cherished memories from travelers.
translation: 一群鬼婆偷走了很多旅行者的珍贵记忆。

original: A villain seeks powerful magic in an ancient ruin, hoping to use it to conquer the region.
translation: 一个反派在一座古老的遗迹中寻找强大的魔法，妄图利用它征服整个国家。

original: A scheming aristocrat hosts a masquerade ball, which many guests see as an opportunity to advance their own agendas. At least one shape-shifting monster also attends.
translation: 一位富于心计的贵族举办了一场化妆舞会，许多宾客都将这个舞会视为实现自己野心的契机。但是在这场舞会中也出席了至少一只变形怪。

original: A ship carrying a valuable treasure or an evil Artifact sinks in a storm or monster attack.
translation: 一艘运载着一件珍贵宝藏或邪恶神器的船在一场风暴或怪物的袭击中沉没了。

original: A natural disaster was actually caused by magic gone awry or a cult’s villainous plans.
translation: 一种实则由出错的魔法或邪教徒的邪恶计划所引发的自然灾害正在肆虐。

original: A secretive cult uses spies to heighten tensions between two rival nations, hoping to provoke a war that will weaken both.
translation: 一个秘密邪教利用间谍在两个对立国家间挑拨矛盾，妄图引发战争并削弱两国的力量。

original: Rebels or forces of an enemy nation have kidnapped an important noble.
translation: 一支叛军或敌国军队绑架了一位重要的贵族。

original: The descendants of a displaced people want to reclaim their ancestral city, which is now inhabited by monsters.
translation: 一群背井离乡的族裔后代想要夺回他们祖先的城市，而这座城市现在已经被怪物所占据。

original: A renowned group of adventurers never returned from an expedition to a famous ruin.
translation: 一群声名远扬的冒险者在前往了一处知名遗迹后再也没回来。

original: Respected, fair, and just leader or council
translation: 受人敬仰、公平公正的领袖或议会
受抗议的领袖（有公开暴力事件）
执着于争吵的议会，难以做出决策
快要离世的领袖（继任者未定）
意志坚定且受人尊敬的领袖或议会

original: While attuned to the Artifact, one of your ability scores (DM’s choice) increases by 2, to a maximum of 24.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你的一项属性值（由DM选择）提升 2，最多为 24。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you regain 1d6 Hit Points at the start of each of your turns if you have at least 1 Hit Point.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，若你具有至少 1 点生命值，则你在你的每个回合开始时，恢复 1d6 生命值。

original: When you hit with an attack roll while attuned to the Artifact, the target takes an extra 1d6 Force damage.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，当你的攻击检定命中时，目标将额外受到 1d6 力场伤害。

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, your Speed increases by 10 feet.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你的速度提升 10 尺。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you can cast one level 4 spell (chosen by the DM) from it. After you cast the spell, roll 1d6. On a roll of 1–5, you can’t cast it again in this way until the next dawn.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你可以从该神器中施展一道 4 环法术（法术由DM选择）。在你施展该法术后，掷 1d6。若结果为 1-5，则直至次日黎明你无法再次以此法施展该法术。

original: As 51–60 above, except the spell is level 5.
translation: 如 51-60 一行所述，除了把法术环阶改为 5 环。

original: As 51–60 above, except the spell is level 6.
translation: 如 51-60 一行所述，除了把法术环阶改为 6 环。

original: As 51–60 above, except the spell is level 7.
translation: 如 51-60 一行所述，除了把法术环阶改为 7 环。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Immunity to the Blinded, Deafened, Petrified, and Stunned conditions.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你具有对目盲、耳聋、石化以及震慑状态的免疫。

original: You can’t attune to other magic items while you’re attuned to the Artifact. When you become attuned to the Artifact, your Attunement to other magic items ends immediately.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你无法与任何其他魔法物品同调。当你与该神器同调时，你与其他魔法物品的同调立即结束。

original: When you become attuned to the Artifact, a random one of your ability scores is reduced by 2, to a minimum of 3. A Greater Restoration spell restores the ability.
translation: 当你与该神器同调时，你的随机一项属性值降低 2，最低为 3。法术 高等复原术 可以使该属性复原。

original: When you become attuned to the Artifact, you take 8d10 Psychic damage.
translation: 当你与该神器同调时，你受到 8d10 心灵伤害。

original: The first time you become attuned to the Artifact, it gives you a quest determined by the DM. You can’t use any of the Artifact’s properties until you complete the quest.
translation: 当你首次与该神器同调时，该神器将会给予你一项由DM决定的任务。你无法使用该神器的任何词条，直到你完成了该任务。

original: Each time you become attuned to the Artifact, there is a 10 percent chance that you attract the attention of a god who sends an avatar to wrest the Artifact from you. The avatar has the same alignment as its creator and uses the Empyrean stat block. Once it obtains the Artifact, the avatar vanishes.
translation: 每当你与该神器同调时，都将有 10% 的概率引起某位神明的注意，然后该神明将派遣化身下凡来把该神器从你手上夺走。该化身的阵营与其创造者相同，并使用 至高天 的数据卡。一旦取得该神器，则该化身立即消失。

original: Each time you become attuned to the Artifact, you must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or die from the shock. If you die, you’re instantly transformed into a Wight under the DM’s control that must protect the Artifact.
translation: 每当你与该神器同调时，你必须成功通过一次DC 10 的体质豁免，否则将被震死。如果你死亡，则你将立即转化为一只处于DM控制下的 尸妖 ，且必须保护该神器。

original: The Artifact dilutes potions within 10 feet of itself, rendering them nonmagical.
translation: 该神器将使位于其自身 10 尺内的所有药剂被稀释，并导致这些药剂变为非魔法的。

original: The Artifact erases scrolls within 10 feet of itself, rendering them nonmagical.
translation: 该神器将擦除位于其自身 10 尺内的所有卷轴上的字迹，并导致这些卷轴变为非魔法的

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, creatures of a particular type other than Humanoid (chosen by the DM) are always Hostile toward you.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，除类人之外的某个特定种类的生物（由DM所选择）均与你敌对。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Vulnerability to all damage.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你具有对所有伤害类型的易伤。

original: The Artifact imprisons a Death Slaad. Each time you become attuned to the Artifact, the slaad has a 10 percent chance of escaping, whereupon it appears in an unoccupied space as close to you as possible and attacks you.
translation: 该神器中囚禁着一只 史拉亡蟾。每当你与该神器同调时，该史拉亡蟾有 10% 概率出逃，然后出现在距离你最近的一处未被占据的空间内并对你展开攻击。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you can’t spend Hit Point Dice or regain Hit Points.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你无法消耗生命骰或恢复生命值。

key: entries->Manual of Golems: Type, Time, and Cost->name
original: Manual of Golems: Type, Time, and Cost
translation: 魔像手册：类型、时间、花费

key: entries->Manual of Golems: Type, Time, and Cost->results->1-5
translation:
魔像：粘土魔像
时间： 60 天
花费： 50,000 GP

key: entries->Manual of Golems: Type, Time, and Cost->results->6-17
translation:
魔像：粘土魔像
时间： 60 天
花费： 50,000 GP

key: entries->Manual of Golems: Type, Time, and Cost->results->18-18
translation:
魔像：钢铁魔像
时间： 120 天
花费： 100,000 GP

key: entries->Manual of Golems: Type, Time, and Cost->results->19-20
translation:
魔像：石魔像
时间： 90 天
花费： 80,000 GP
四只 紫蕈 和一只 锈蚀怪
一只 巨蜘蛛 和两个 虫群 （蜘蛛）
一只 暗幕魔兽 和三只 穿刺者

original: A patch of yellow mold (see Hazards in chapter 3) on a miner’s remains
translation: 生长在一具矿工遗体上的一片黄霉菌（见第 3 章 “危害 ”一节）

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you gain proficiency in one skill of the DM’s choice.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你获得一项由DM所选择的技能熟练

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Immunity to the Poisoned condition.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你具有对中毒状态的免疫

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你具有对魅惑状态与恐慌状态的免疫。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Resistance to one damage type of the DM’s choice.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你具有对由DM所选择的一项伤害类型的抗性。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you can cast one cantrip (chosen by the DM) from it.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你可以从该神器中施展一道戏法（戏法由DM选择）

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you can cast one level 1 spell (chosen by the DM) from it. After you cast the spell, roll 1d6. On a roll of 1–5, you can’t cast it again in this way until the next dawn.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你可以从该神器中施展一道 1 环法术（法术由DM选择）。在你施展该法术后，掷 1d6。若结果为 1-5，则直至次日黎明，你无法再次以此法施展该法术。

original: As 61–70 above, except the spell is level 2.
translation: 如 61-70 一行所述，除了把法术环阶改为 2 环。

original: As 61–70 above, except the spell is level 3.
translation: 如 61-70 一行所述，除了把法术环阶改为 3 环。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你的护甲等级获得 +1 加值。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Disadvantage on any ability check or saving throw that uses Strength or Constitution.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你使用力量或体质进行的属性检定与豁免检定均具有劣势。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你在使用感知、智力和魅力进行的豁免检定均具有劣势。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have Vulnerability to Poison damage.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你具有对毒素伤害的易伤。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have the Blinded condition when you’re more than 10 feet away from it.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，当你与该神器间的距离大于 10 尺时，你陷入目盲状态。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you have the Deafened condition when you’re more than 10 feet away from it.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，当你与该神器间的距离大于 10 尺时，你陷入耳聋状态。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you lose all sense of smell.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你失去所有味觉。

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, your appearance changes as the DM decides.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你的外貌按照DM所决定的样子发生改变。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you emit a sour stench noticeable from up to 10 feet away.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你会散发出 10 尺内都能闻到的巨大酸臭味。

original: Whenever you touch a nonmagical gem or an art object while attuned to this Artifact, the value of the gem or art object is reduced by half. This affects a particular object only once.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，每当你触碰某件非魔法的宝石或艺术品时，该宝石或艺术品的价格便将减半。每件物品只能以此法被影响一次。

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, all Holy Water within 10 feet of you is destroyed.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，任何位于你 10 尺内的圣水都将被摧毁。

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, nonmagical flames are extinguished within 30 feet of you.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，任何位于你 30 尺内的非魔法火焰都将熄灭。

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, other creatures can’t take Short or Long Rests while within 300 feet of you.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，任何其他生物无法在位于你 300 尺内的区域进行长休或短休。

original: While attuned to the Artifact, you kill any nonmagical vegetation you touch that isn’t a creature.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，你将杀死任何你所触碰的，非生物的非魔法植株。

original: While you’re attuned to the Artifact, Beasts within 30 feet of you that have a Challenge Rating of 6 or lower are Hostile toward you.
translation: 在与该神器同调期间，任何位于你 30 尺内的、挑战等级 及以下的野兽均开始与你敌对。

original: Beacon. You can take a Bonus Action to cause the item to shed Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet, or to extinguish the light.
translation: 灯火。 你可以执行一个附赠动作令该物品散发出半径 10 尺的明亮光照以及额外 10 尺的微光光照，或令该物品散发的光芒熄灭。

original: Compass. You can take a Magic action to learn which way is magnetic north. Nothing happens if this property is used in a location that has no magnetic north.
translation: 罗盘。 你可以执行一个魔法动作以知晓磁北方向所在。若该词条在没有磁北的区域中使用，则其不会产生任何效果。

original: Delver. While underground, you always know the item’s depth below the surface and the direction to the nearest staircase, ramp, or other path leading upward.
translation: 深掘者。 在地下时，你总是能够知道该物品所处深度以及距离最近的楼梯，坡道或任何向上延伸的道路所处的方位。

original: Guardian. The item warns you, granting a +2 bonus to your Initiative rolls if you don’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 守护者。 该物品会为你发出警告，只要你未陷入失能状态，则该物品将为你的先攻检定提供 +2 加值。

original: Harmonious. Attuning to this item takes only 1 minute.
translation: 调谐。 与该物品同调仅需 1 分钟。

original: Key. The item is used to unlock a container, chamber, vault, or door.
translation: 锁钥。 该物品可以被用来解锁某件容器、某个房间、某个金库或某扇大门。

original: Secret Message. A message is hidden somewhere on the item. It might be visible only at a certain time, under the light of one phase of the moon, or in a specific location.
translation: 密令。 一条信息被藏于该物品的某处。该信息可能只有在特定时间、特定地点或者某一月相的月光下才会显现。

original: Sentinel. The DM chooses a kind of creature, such as mind flayers or trolls. This item glows faintly when such creatures are within 120 feet of it.
translation: 哨戒者。 DM选定一种生物，例如夺心魔或巨魔。该物品会在所选定生物进入其120尺内时发出微弱的光芒。

original: Songcraft. Whenever this item is struck or is used to strike a foe, you hear a fragment of an ancient song.
translation: 奇材怪料。 制作该物品的材料以某种奇怪的方式满足该物品的用途。但这并不影响其耐久。

original: Strange Material. The item was created from a material that is bizarre given its purpose. Its durability is unaffected.
translation: 奇材怪料。 制作该物品的材料以某种奇怪的方式满足该物品的用途。但这并不影响其耐久。

original: Temperate. You are unharmed by temperatures of 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, and 100 degrees Fahrenheit or higher.
translation: 令人暖心。 你在 0 度及以下或 100 度及以上的华氏温度下皆能安然无恙。（译注：即 -18 摄氏度以下，38 摄氏度以上。）

original: Unbreakable. The item can’t be broken. Special means must be used to destroy it.
translation: 坚不可摧。 该物品无法被破坏。只有某些特殊手段方可摧毁该物品。

original: War Leader. You can take a Magic action to cause your voice or signal to carry clearly for up to 600 feet until the end of your next turn.
translation: 水上漂。 该物品可以浮在水或其他液体之上。你为游泳进行的力量（运动）检定具有优势。

original: Waterborne. This item floats on water and other liquids. You have Advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to swim.
translation: 水上漂。 该物品可以浮在水或其他液体之上。你为游泳进行的力量（运动）检定具有优势。
再骰两次，并重骰接下来任何结果为 20 的骰子。

单音节名：柯瑞尔

单音节姓：卓格

单音节名：戴恩

单音节姓：达斯科（黄昏）

单音节名：多恩

单音节姓：霍鲁格

单音节名：格林

单音节姓：伊米什

单音节名：格林

单音节姓：伊米什

单音节名：汉克

单音节姓：加斯科

单音节名：克鲁斯克

单音节姓：凯斯

单音节名：诺克斯

单音节姓：库

单音节名：尼克斯

单音节姓：空

单音节名：鲁克

单音节姓：莫特

original: Boastful; makes a show of bravery but runs from danger
translation: 自负；看似勇敢但遇到危险就会开溜

original: Two monsters have a bitter rivalry; each wants the other to suffer.
translation: 两只怪物处于敌对关系；他们彼此都想让对方吃点苦头。

original: One monster, bullied by the others, hangs back and flees at the first opportunity.
translation: 一只被其他生物欺凌的怪物总是畏缩不前，他一有机会就会立刻逃走

original: One monster is revered or even worshiped by the others, who will die for it.
translation: 一只怪物受到了其他生物的尊敬甚至崇拜，它们愿意为它而死。

original: One monster is admired by the group; its allies try to impress or help it.
translation: 一只怪物受到了族群的欣赏，而它的盟友则在试图讨好或帮助它。

original: One monster cares only for itself and not the rest of the group.
translation: 一只怪物只关心它自己，而对剩余的同伴置之不顾。

original: One monster bullies the others; it forces them into danger, but they want it defeated.
translation: 一只怪物喜欢霸凌其他人，它迫使它们身陷险境，而它们希望这个怪物遭人击败。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.o2IcKz2aAooQr7EK]
Increase the weapon’s bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls by 1, to a maximum of +3. Reroll if the Moonblade already has a +3 bonus.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.o2IcKz2aAooQr7EK]
以此武器进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰的加值提升 1，至多提升至 +3。若月刃已具有 +3 加值则重骰。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.vwQstbhAl6CdxUeN]
When you hit with an attack roll using the Moonblade , you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage. Each time the weapon gains this property after the first, the extra damage increases by 1d6, to a maximum of 3d6. Reroll if the Moonblade already deals an extra 3d6 Force damage on a hit.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.vwQstbhAl6CdxUeN]
当你以月刃 进行的攻击检定命中时，你额外造成 1d6 力场伤害。在此武器第一次获得该词条后，每当其再次获得该词条，额外伤害提升 1d6，至多提升至 3d6。若月刃已具有 3d6 额外伤害则重骰。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.2lApMhxs1SMQFEqE]
The Moonblade gains the Thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. Each time you throw the weapon, it flies back to your hand after the attack.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.2lApMhxs1SMQFEqE]
月刃获得投掷（射程20/60尺）词条，每当你投掷此武器进行攻击后，此武器回到你的手中。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.VC3o2KY4btBnaIAc]
The Moonblade scores a &Reference[CriticalHits]{Critical Hit} on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.VC3o2KY4btBnaIAc]
你以月刃进行的攻击检定在 d20 中掷出 19 或 20 时造成重击。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.rzsbnjT5QiK2Jq8E]
You can take a Bonus Action to cause the Moonblade to flash brightly. Each other creature that is within 30 feet of you and not behind Total Cover must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the Blinded condition for 1 minute. A creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. You can’t use this property again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.rzsbnjT5QiK2Jq8E]
你能够以一个附赠动作令月刃闪烁光芒。位于你 30 尺内的未处于全身掩护后的所有其他生物必须成功通过一次DC 15 的体质豁免，否则陷入目盲状态，持续一分钟。陷入目盲的生物在其每个回合结束时重新进行该豁免，豁免成功则其身上的该效应提前结束。该词条一经使用，直至完成短休或长休你都无法再次使用。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.vZ0T3fFRBE3NHG6o]
The Moonblade has the properties of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgRingOfSpellSt]{Ring of Spell Storing}.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.vZ0T3fFRBE3NHG6o]
月刃 获得@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgRingOfSpellSt]{储法戒指} 的词条。

original:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.Qzkx9WVqILq2hG5c]
You can take a Magic action to conjure a spectral entity that resembles a shadowy elf if you don’t already have one serving you. The entity appears in an unoccupied space within 120 feet of you. It uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.QGcQYZbVl4bWzi4E]{Shadow} stat block with these changes: it is a Fey, has a Neutral alignment, and doesn’t create new shadows. You control this entity, deciding how it acts and moves. It remains until it drops to 0 Hit Points or you dismiss it as a Magic action.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgMoonblade0000.ActiveEffect.Qzkx9WVqILq2hG5c]
你能够以一个魔法动作召唤一名灵体，该灵体看起来像是蒙着阴影的精灵一般。你灵体出现在位于你 120 尺内的未占据空间中，它使用@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.actors.Actor.QGcQYZbVl4bWzi4E]{幽影}的数据，但具有以下更改：其生物类型为妖精，阵营为绝对中立，并且无法唤起新的幽影。你控制这名灵体，决定其如何行动或移动，灵体持续存在直至其生命值降至 0 或你以一个魔法动作解除灵体。你无法在已有一名侍奉你的灵体时召唤更多灵体。

original: The NPC is in disguise, concealing their identity or some aspect of their appearance.
translation: 这位NPC是一位易容伪装者，隐藏着自己的真实身份或是对自己外貌的某些方面做了 伪装

original: The NPC is currently planning, executing, or covering up a crime.
translation: 这位NPC正在谋划、执行或掩盖一场犯罪

original: The NPC (or their family) has been threatened with harm unless the NPC does something.
translation: 这位NPC（或其家人）被人以残害作威胁，令其不得不做某些事

original: The NPC is under a magical compulsion (perhaps a Geas spell or some kind of curse) to behave in a certain way.
translation: 这位NPC被某种魔法效应胁迫（如 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGeas000000] 或某种诅咒），必须以特定的方式行事

original: The NPC is seriously ill or in terrible pain.
translation: 这位NPC身缠重病，或正处在严重的痛苦之中

original: The NPC feels responsible for someone’s death or ill fortune.
translation: 这位NPC认为自己对某人的死亡或某场噩运负有责任

original: The NPC is on the brink of financial ruin.
The NPC is desperately lonely or harboring an unrequited passion.
translation: 这位NPC深陷名为孤独的绝望或对某人单相思而不得

original: The NPC is deeply dissatisfied or unhappy.
translation: 这位NPC内心十分地失落或不满

original: A town crier announces that someone is hoping to hire adventurers.
translation: 一个城镇布告员宣布有人正希望雇佣冒险者。

original: Someone the characters want to impress or need a favor from asks them to deal with the adventure situation.
translation: 角色们想要示好或需要寻求帮助的对象要求他们处理一个冒险情景。

original: When the characters arrive in a new city, they find a job board where someone has posted in search of adventurers.
translation: 当角色们来到一个新城市时，他们找到一个招聘栏，上面发布着征集冒险者的消息。

original: A wealthy patron who is aware of the adventurers’ accomplishments writes to them, offering to pay them for their talents.
translation: 一个了解到冒险者们的功绩的富有赞助者给他们写了一份信，愿意为他们的才能买单。

original: A citizen in need, who has learned of the adventurers’ accomplishments and kindness, travels miles to find them and implore them for help.
translation: 一个需要帮助的市民在了解到冒险者们的功绩和善举后，不远千里来找到他们，寻求他们的帮助。

original: The adventurers are arrested (on valid or invented charges) and offered a chance to escape punishment by completing a quest.
translation: 冒险者们被捕（罪名可以成立或捏造），并有机会通过完成一项任务来逃脱责罚。

original: When magic fails to revive a dead person, the only solution is to venture to the Outer Planes to find the person’s spirit and either release it from some prison or convince the person to return to life.
translation: 当魔法无法复活死者时，唯一的解决方案便是前往外层位面，找到那人的灵魂，要么将其从某种监狱释放出来，要么说服那人起死回生。

original: People who venture into the woods keep accidentally wandering into the Feywild or the Shadowfell. They might never return, return with no sense of how much time has passed, or return dramatically changed.
translation: 进入森林中的堡的人们意外闯进了妖精荒野或堕影冥界。他们也许永远不会回来了，也可能回来了却没意识到过去了多久时间，又或者回来了却发生了非常大的变化。

original: A long-dead oracle is the only one who knows how a terrible prophecy might be averted, but the cataclysmic fulfillment of the prophecy has already begun.
translation: 一位死亡许久的先知是唯一知道如何避免一则可怕预言成真的人，但预言已经开始灾难性地实现。

original: A god has stopped answering prayers and won’t respond to any Commune spell.
translation: 一位神停止回应其祈祷者，也拒绝回应任何 通神术 。

original: A devil has tricked an angel into meddling in the Blood War, and the angel seeks mortal aid.
translation: 一位恶魔诱使一位天使参与血战，而天使正在为此寻找凡人的援助。

original: A ancestor of one of the characters must be convinced to bless the character before the full power of the character’s bloodline can be unleashed.
translation: 其中一位角色的祖先必须先被说服以祝佑该角色，否则其血脉便无法觉醒。

original: A foolhardy knight carried a holy weapon on a doomed mission into the Nine Hells, and the powers of Mount Celestia want the weapon and the knight’s remains retrieved.
translation: 一位愚勇的骑士携带着神圣武器在九层地狱执行着注定失败的任务，而天界山的大能希望角色能取回这件武器及骑士的遗体。

original: A titan is imprisoned on an Outer Plane. The characters might be trying to stop those who seek to release it, or they might want to release it to help defend the world from a greater threat.
translation: 一位泰坦被囚禁在外层位面。角色可能要阻止那些试图释放它的人，或者释放它以从更大的威胁手中保护世界。

original: To prove themselves worthy of an even greater quest, the characters are sent to slay a horrible monster, win the favor of a powerful planar being, negotiate peace between two warring planar factions, or retrieve a long-lost item on another plane.
translation: 为了证明自己配得上更伟大的任务，角色被派去猎杀可怕的怪物、赢得某个强大位面生物的青睐、调停两个敌对的位面派系，或是取回某个在异界失落已久的物品。

original: An item of legend is being sold at auction in Sigil, the City of Brass, or some other planar metropolis.
translation: 印记城、黄铜之城或其他某个位面大都市的拍卖会上正在出售一件传奇物品。

original: Both potions lose their effects, and the mixture creates a magical explosion in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area takes [[/damage 4d10 type=force]] damage.
translation: 两种药剂均失去其效应，且该混合物将在以其自身为中心5尺半径的球状区域内产生一场魔法性爆炸。该区域内的每名生物将受到 [[/damage 4d10 type=force]] 伤害。

original: Both potions lose their effects, and the mixture becomes an ingested poison of your choice (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.UfAEdm3LbTzvQHC5]{Poison}).
translation: 两种药剂均失去其效应，且该混合物变成一种由你所选择的服用型毒药（见第3章“@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.UfAEdm3LbTzvQHC5]{毒药}”）。
两种药剂均失去其效应
其中一种药剂失去其效应。

original: Both potions work, but with their numerical effects and durations halved. If a potion has no numerical effect and no duration, it instead loses its effect.
translation: 两种药剂均生效，但它们所有以数值表示的效应及其持续时间均减半。若某种药剂没有任何以数值表示的效应，也没有持续时间，则该药剂失效。

original: Both potions work, but the numerical effects and duration of one potion are doubled. If neither potion has anything to double in this way, they work normally.
translation: 两种药剂均生效，但它们所有以数值表示的效应及其持续时间均翻倍。若两种药剂都没有任何能够以该方式翻倍的地方，则两者如常生效。

original: Only one potion works, but its effects are permanent. Choose the simplest effect to make permanent or the one that seems the most fun. For example, a Potion of Healing might increase the drinker’s Hit Point maximum by [[/roll 2d4 + 2]], or a Potion of Invisibility might give the drinker the Invisible condition indefinitely. At your discretion, a Dispel Magic spell or similar magic might end this lasting effect.
translation: 只有其中一种药剂可以生效，但其效应将变为永久效应。选择一项最直截了当的或者看上去最能整活的效应，使其变为永久效应。例如，治疗药水可能会为饮用者提高[[/r 2d4+2]]点生命值上限，又或者隐形药水可能会给予饮用者无期限的隐形状态。依你的裁决，法术解除魔法或者类似的法术或许能够终止该持续中的效应。
偏离方向：增加 1d6 日旅行时间

original: Blown astray; add 3d10 days to travel time
translation: 吹离原路：增加 3d10 日旅行时间

original: Lost; at the end of the travel time, the characters arrive at a location other than the intended destination
translation: 迷失方向：旅行结束时抵达另一处并非预期目的地的地点

original: Sent through a random color pool (roll on the Astral Color Pools table)
translation: 被抛入随机彩池（在星界彩池表上掷骰决定）

original: You have the &Reference[Stunned] condition for 1 minute; you repeat the saving throw at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on yourself on a success.
translation: 你陷入 &Reference[Stunned] 状态，持续 1 分钟；你可以在你的每回合结束时重复此豁免，豁免成功则你身上的此效应终止。

original: You have the &Reference[Unconscious] condition for [[/r 1d10]] hours; the effect on you ends if you take damage or if another creature takes an action to shake you awake.
translation: 你陷入 &Reference[Unconscious] 状态，持续 [[/r 1d10]] 小时；若你受到伤害或另一名生物用一个动作将你摇醒，你身上的此效应结束。

original: Blissful. You feel fortunate and optimistic about what the future holds. Butterflies and other harmless creatures might frolic in the item’s presence.
translation: 幸福。 你对未来的事情感到富裕且充满希望。蝴蝶或其他无害的生物可能会在该物品周围嬉戏逗留。

original: Confident. The item helps you feel self-assured.
translation: 自信。 该物品使你感到自信满满。

original: Covetous. You become obsessed with material wealth.
translation: 贪婪。 你对物质财富变得痴迷。

original: Fragile. The item crumbles, frays, chips, or cracks slightly when wielded, worn, or activated. This quirk has no effect on its properties.
translation: 易碎。 当该物品被持用，着装或激活时，其将产生碎屑、磨损、破块或开裂。该影响不会对该物品的词条产生影响。

original: Loud. The item makes a loud noise—such as a clang, a shout, or a resonating gong—when used.
translation: 喧闹。 该物品在使用时会发出很大的声响——例如叮当声、喊叫声或者足以产生回音的钟声。

original: Metamorphic. The item periodically alters its appearance in slight ways. You have no control over these minor alterations, which have no effect on the item’s use.
translation: 变形。 该物品以微小变化的方式周期性地改变外观。你无法对这些微小变化进行控制，而这些微小变化亦不妨碍物品的使用。

original: Painful. You experience a harmless flash of pain when using the item.
translation: 疼痛。 当使用该物品时，你将经历一瞬间无害的疼痛。

original: Repulsive. You feel a sense of distaste when in contact with the item and continue to experience discomfort while bearing it.
translation: 嫌恶。 当你在与该物品互动的时候会感到一阵倒胃口，并且你在拥有该物品期间将一直感到不适。
瓦尔哈拉号角 （@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgBrassHornOfVa]{黄铜} 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgSilverHornOfV]{白银}）
法术卷轴（四环或五环法术）
法术卷轴（二环或三环法术）
法术卷轴（六环、七环或八环法术）
法术卷轴（六环、七环或八环法术）

key: entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->name
original: Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone
translation: 抗性戒指：伤害类型和宝石

key: entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->1-1
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->2-2
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->3-3
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->4-4
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->5-5
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->6-6
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->7-7
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->8-8
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->9-9
entries->Ring of Resistance: Damage Type and Gemstone->results->10-10

original: Silver coffer (1 foot long, 6 inches wide and deep) worth 500 GP
translation: 价值 500 GP的银柜（高 1 尺，宽、深各 6 寸）

original: Iron door (up to 10 feet wide and 10 feet high, barred on one side of your choice), which you can place in an opening you can reach; it conforms to fit the opening, attaching and hinging itself
translation: 铁门（宽最多 10 尺、高最大 10 尺，且你选择的一面装有门闩），你可将其安置在一处你触及内的开口处，它将自动改变形状贴合开口并设置铰链。

original: Open pit (a 10-foot Cube), which you can place on the ground within 10 feet of yourself
translation: 露天陷坑（10 尺立方），你可将其布置在你周边 10 尺范围内的地面上

original: Spell Scroll containing one spell of level 1, 2, or 3 (your choice)
translation: 记载有一道一环、二环或三环法术（由你选择）的法术卷轴

original: Window (2 feet by 4 feet, up to 2 feet deep), which you can place on a vertical surface you can reach
translation: 窗户（2 尺× 4 尺，最多 2 尺深），你可将其布置在一处你能触及的垂直表面上。

original: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgScrollOfTitan.ActiveEffect.iGenMHTf7Uuy0sQ1]{Kraken} (a kraken requires a body of water large enough to contain it, or the summoning fails and the scroll is wasted)
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgScrollOfTitan.ActiveEffect.iGenMHTf7Uuy0sQ1]{克拉肯}（召唤一只克拉肯需要足以容纳它躯体的水体，否则召唤失败且卷轴被浪费）

original: Hearing and standard vision out to 30 feet
translation: 30 尺听觉及30 尺正常视觉

original: Hearing and standard vision out to 60 feet
translation: 60 尺听觉及60 尺正常视觉

original: Hearing and standard vision out to 120 feet
translation: 120 尺听觉及 120 尺正常视觉

original: Hearing and Darkvision out to 120 feet
translation: 120 尺听觉及 120 尺黑暗视觉

original: Apathy. The character has Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws and Initiative rolls.
translation: 冷漠。 角色在死亡豁免和先攻检定上具有劣势。

original: Dread. The character has Disadvantage on all saving throws.
translation: 恐惧。 角色在所有豁免上具有劣势。

original: Delusion. The character has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws that use Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.
translation: 幻觉。 角色在所有基于智力、感知和魅力的属性检定和豁免上具有劣势。

邪性的名：阿拉克涅

邪性的姓：末日低语

邪性的名：阿凯司

邪性的姓：恐怖之王

邪性的名：腐血

邪性的姓：绞架

邪性的名：格林乌斯

邪性的姓：炼狱狂袭

邪性的名：梅尔奇斯

邪性的姓：鸦杀

邪性的名：魔索斯

邪性的姓：夜刃

邪性的名：纳迪尔

邪性的姓：诺里修斯

邪性的名：妄言

邪性的姓：影牙

邪性的名：斯凯兰迪

邪性的姓：瓦尔塔

邪性的名：萨尔图斯

邪性的姓：寒冬之咒

邪性的名：瓦洛寇拉

邪性的姓：珊铎司

邪性的名：维克山大

邪性的姓：扎基佐恩

original: Aligned. The item seeks to defeat or destroy those of a diametrically opposed alignment. Such an item is never Neutral.
translation: 排异。 该物品试图击败或摧毁那些阵营与该物品完全相反的事物。一件这样的物品不可能是中立阵营。

original: Bane. The item seeks to thwart or destroy creatures of a particular type, such as Constructs, Fiends, or Undead.
translation: 制造灾祸。 该物品试图挫败或毁灭某个特定种类的生物，例如构装，邪魔或亡灵。

original: Creator Seeker. The item seeks its creator and wants to understand why it was created.
translation: 寻找创造者。 该物品试图寻找其创造者并想要知道自己为什么会被制造出来。

original: Destiny Seeker. The item believes it and its bearer have key roles to play in future events.
translation: 寻求天命。 该物品相信自身和其拥有者将会在未来某个事件中扮演关键角色。

original: Destroyer. The item craves destruction and goads its user to fight arbitrarily.
translation: 破坏者。 该物品渴望破坏，并会刺激其使用者肆意争斗。

original: Glory Seeker. The item seeks renown as the greatest magic item in the world by winning fame or notoriety for its user.
translation: 寻求荣誉。 该物品试图令其使用者声名远扬或者声名狼藉，来赢得“世界上最伟大的魔法物品”的荣誉。

original: Lore Seeker. The item craves knowledge or is determined to solve a mystery, learn a secret, or unravel a cryptic prophecy.
translation: 寻求知识。 该物品渴望获得知识，又或者其决定解决某个谜团、了解某个秘密或揭开某个隐晦的预言。

original: Protector. The item seeks to defend a particular kind of creature, such as elves or werewolves.
translation: 保护者。 该物品试图守护一名特定种类的生物，例如精灵或狼人。

original: Soulmate Seeker. The item seeks another sentient magic item, perhaps one that is similar to itself.
translation: 寻求知己。 该物品试图寻找另一件智能魔法物品，或许是一件与其本身相似的物品。

original: Templar. The item seeks to defend the servants and interests of a particular deity.
translation: 圣殿骑士。 该物品试图守护一位特定神明的仆人及该神明的利益。

original: The sphere moves through the portal or into the extradimensional space.
translation: 法球穿过位面传送门或进入异位面空间。

original: A spatial rift sends the sphere and each creature and object within 180 feet of the sphere to a random plane of existence.
translation: 一个空间裂缝出现，将湮灭法球和位于其 180 尺内的所有生物和物件送到一个随机存在位面。

original: The characters all have a vivid dream that foreshadows elements of the adventure.
translation: 角色们都做了一个逼真的梦，梦境预示了冒险的内容。

original: While preparing spells, one character receives a quest from a god or patron.
translation: 在准备法术时，一个角色收到了来自神明或赞助者的委托。

original: A fortune teller’s reading for one of the characters points to a quest and offers hints about challenges that lie ahead.
translation: 一个占卜术算出其中一名角色的未来将会指向一项任务，同时他也提供了一些关于前路上挑战的提示。

original: Flames, clouds, smoke, or huge flocks of birds take distinct shapes that portend the adventure situation.
translation: 动物或活化的物件向冒险者们口吐人言，清晰地把他们引向一个冒险情景。

original: Animals or animated objects speak clearly to direct the adventurers toward the situation.
translation: 动物或活化的物件向冒险者们口吐人言，清晰地把他们引向一个冒险情景。

original: Someone who died returns as a ghost and haunts the characters. The ghost prompts the characters to investigate the cause of the ghost’s death and put it to rest.
translation: 某个已死之人以鬼魂的形态回到现世并在角色们身边作祟。它的出现导致角色们前去调查它的死因并让它得以安息。

original: Roll on a Common Magic Items table of your choice (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArcanaCommon0]{Arcana}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArmamentsComm]{Armaments}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgImplementsCom]{Implements}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRelicsCommon0]{Relics}).
translation: 在你选择的普通魔法物品表格（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArcanaCommon0]{奥秘}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArmamentsComm]{武备}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgImplementsCom]{器具}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRelicsCommon0]{圣物}）。

original: Roll on an Uncommon Magic Items table of your choice (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArcanaUncommo]{Arcana}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArmamentsUnco]{Armaments}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgImplementsUnc]{Implements}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRelicsUncommo]{Relics}).
translation: 在你选择的非普通魔法物品表格（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArcanaCommon0]{奥秘}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArmamentsComm]{武备}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgImplementsCom]{器具}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRelicsCommon0]{圣物}）。

original: Roll on a Rare Magic Items table of your choice (@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArcanaRare000]{Arcana}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArmamentsRare]{Armaments}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgImplementsRar]{Implements}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRelicsRare000]{Relics}).
translation: 在你选择的珍稀魔法物品表格（@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArcanaCommon0]{奥秘}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgArmamentsComm]{武备}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgImplementsCom]{器具}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.tables.RollTable.dmgRelicsCommon0]{圣物}）。

original: A cart or another large obstacle blocks your way. Make a [[/save dex dc=10]] saving throw to get past the obstacle. On a failed save, the obstacle counts as 10 feet of &Reference[Difficult Terrain] for you.
translation: 一辆二轮货车或是其他大型障碍挡住了你的去路。成功通过一个 [[/save dex dc=10]] 豁免可以顺利越过障碍物，否则这个障碍物对你而言视为 10 尺 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

original: A crowd blocks your way. Make a [[/save str dc=10]], [[/save dex dc=10]], or [[/save cha dc=10]] saving throw (your choice) to navigate through the crowd. On a failed save, the crowd counts as 10 feet of &Reference[Difficult Terrain] for you.
translation: 人群挡住了你的去路，进行一次 [[/save str dc=10]]、 [[/save dex dc=10]]、 或 [[/save cha dc=10]] 豁免（由你决定）来尝试穿越人群。如果豁免失败，人群对你而言视为 10 尺 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

original: A maze of barrels, crates, or similar obstacles stands in your way. Make a [[/save dex dc=10]] or [[/save int dc=10]] saving throw (your choice) to navigate the maze. On a failed save, the maze counts as 10 feet of &Reference[Difficult Terrain] for you.
translation: 一个由木桶、箱子或者类似障碍物组成的乱径挡住了你的去路。通过一个[[/save dex dc=10]] 或 [[/save int dc=10]]豁免（由你决定）来穿越乱径，如果失败，这段乱径对你而言视为 10 尺困难 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

original: The ground is slippery with rain, spilled oil, or some other liquid. Make a [[/save dex dc=10]] saving throw. On a failed save, you have the &Reference[Prone] condition.
translation: 地面因为雨水、打翻的油或其他液体变得湿滑。进行一次 [[/save dex dc=10]] 豁免，如果豁免失败，你将会陷入&Reference[Prone]。

original: You encounter a brawl in progress. Make a [[/save str dc=15]], [[/save dex dc=15]], or [[/save cha dc=15]] saving throw (your choice) to get past the brawlers unimpeded. On a failed save, you take [[/damage 2d4 type=bludgeoning]] damage, and the brawlers count as 10 feet of &Reference[Difficult Terrain] for you.
translation: 你乱入了一场斗殴。成功通过一次 [[/save str dc=15]]、 [[/save dex dc=15]], or [[/save cha dc=15]] 豁免（由你决定）则可以顺利通过这场斗殴，如果豁免失败，你将受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=bludgeoning]] 伤害，并且斗殴者对你而言视为10尺的 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

original: You must make a sharp turn to avoid colliding with something impassable. Make a [[/save dex dc=10]] saving throw to navigate the turn. On a failed save, you collide with something hard and take [[/damage 1d4 type=bludgeoning]] damage.
translation: 你必须急转弯以避免撞上一个无法通过的东西。进行一次 [[/save dex dc=10]] 豁免来迅速拐弯。如果豁免失败，你会撞上这个坚硬的东西，并受到 [[/damage 1d4 type=bludgeoning]] 伤害。

original: A roll table of effects for the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgWandOfWonder0]{Wand of Wonder} which implements the effects as activities where possible.
translation: 本掷骰表为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.equipment.Item.dmgWandOfWonder0]{惊异魔杖}的效应集合，其中多数魔法效应已实现为独立行动。

original: You cast a spell originating from the chosen point. Roll 1d10 to determine the spell: on a 1–2, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}; on a 3–4, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}; on a 5–6, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball}; on a 7–8, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow}; on a 9–10, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStinkingCl]{Stinking Cloud}.
translation: 你在选择的源点处施展一个法术。投掷 1d10 来决定法术：结 果1-2 为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{黑暗术}；结果 3-4 为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{妖火}；结果 5-6 为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{火球术}；结果 7-8 为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{缓慢术}；结果 9-10 为@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStinkingCl]{臭云术}。

original: Nothing happens at the chosen point of origin. Instead, you have the &Reference[Stunned] condition until the start of your next turn, believing something awesome just happened.
translation: 在选择的源点处无事发生。取而代之的是，你相信刚刚发生了什么令人惊叹的事，因此直到你的下个回合开始前，你陷入&Reference[Stunned]状态。

original: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}. The Line created by the spell extends from you to the chosen point of origin.
translation: 你施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGustofWind]。法术创造的线状区域将从你的位置延伸到选择的源点位置。

original: Nothing happens at the chosen point of origin. Instead, you take [[/damage 1d6 type=psychic]] damage.
translation: 在选择的源点处无事发生。取而代之的是，你受到 [[/damage 1d6 type=psychic]] 伤害。

original: Heavy rain falls for 1 minute in a 120-foot-high, 60-foot-radius Cylinder centered on the chosen point of origin. During that time, the area of effect is &Reference[Lightly Obscured].
translation: 在以选择的源点为中心，120 尺高，半径 60 尺的柱状区域内下起持续 1 分钟的暴雨。持续时间内，效应区域处于&Reference[Lightly Obscured]。

original: A cloud of 600 oversized butterflies fills a 60-foot-high, 30-foot-radius Cylinder centered on the chosen point of origin. The butterflies remain for 10 minutes, during which time the area of effect is &Reference[Heavily Obscured].
translation: 在以选择的源点为中心，60 尺高，半径 30 尺的柱状区域内被一团共 600 只的巨大蝴蝶填满。蝴蝶在 10 分钟内持续存在，并在持续时间内使效应区域处于 &Reference[Heavily Obscured]。

original: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}. The Line created by the spell extends from you to the chosen point of origin.
translation: 你施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]。法术创造的线状区域将从你的位置延伸到选择的源点位置。

original: The creature closest to the chosen point of origin is enlarged as if you had cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]{Enlarge/Reduce} on it. If the target isn’t you and can’t be affected by that spell, you become the target instead.
translation: 距离选择的源点最近的生物被变大，如同你对其释放了@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]中的变巨一般。如果目标不是你且目标不受该法术影响，则你将代替成为目标。

original: A magically formed creature appears in an unoccupied space as close to the chosen point of origin as possible. The creature isn’t under your control, acts as it normally would, and disappears after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine which creature appears. On a 1, a Rhinoceros appears; on a 2, an Elephant appears; and on a 3–4, a Rat appears.
translation: 一个以魔法塑成的生物出现在离源点尽可能近的未占据空间中。这个生物不受你控制，按照其天性行动且在 1 小时后或生命值降为 0 时消失。投掷 1d4 来决定会出现什么生物。结果为 1 时，出现一头犀牛；结果为 2 时，出现一头象；结果为 3-4 时，出现一只老鼠。

original: Grass covers a 60-foot-radius circle of ground, with the center of that circle as close to the chosen point of origin as possible. Grass that’s already there grows to ten times its normal size and remains overgrown for 1 minute.
translation: 以尽可能靠近选定源点的一点为圆心，草地将覆盖半径 60 尺内的圆形地面。原先已经长在区域内的草将生长至通常的十倍长度并维持 1 分钟。

original: An object of the DM’s choice disappears into the Ethereal Plane. The object must be neither worn nor carried, within 120 feet of the chosen point of origin, and no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. If there are no such objects in range, nothing happens.
translation: DM选择的一个物件消失并进入以太位面。这个物件必须未被着装或携带，任一边长不超过 10 尺，且位于选择的源点 120 尺内。如果范围内没有符合条件的物件，则无事发生。

original: Nothing happens at the chosen point of origin. Instead, you shrink as if you had cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]{Enlarge/Reduce} on yourself and remain in that state for 1 minute.
translation: 在选择的源点处无事发生。取而代之的是你将变小，你对自己施展了 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEnlargeRed]中的缩小一般，并在这个状态持续 1 分钟。

original: Leaves grow from the creature nearest to the chosen point of origin. Unless they are picked off, the leaves turn brown and fall off after 24 hours.
translation: 离选择的源点最近的生物身上长出树叶。树叶将在 24 小时后变黄并凋落，除非它们被提前摘下。

original: Nothing happens at the chosen point of origin. Instead, a burst of colorful, shimmering light extends from you in a 30-foot Emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed on a [[/save con 15]] saving throw or have the &Reference[Blinded] condition for 1 minute. A creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
translation: 在选择的源点处无事发生。取而代之的是你的身上迸发出多彩而耀眼的光芒，充斥 30 尺光环区域。区域内的所有生物需要成功通过一次[[/save con 15]]豁免否则陷入持续一分钟的&Reference[Blinded]状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上的效应。

original: Nothing happens at the chosen point of origin. Instead, you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on yourself.
translation: 在选择的源点处无事发生。取而代之的是，你对自身施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]。

original: Nothing happens at the chosen point of origin. Instead, a stream of [[/r 1d4*10 #Gems]] gems, each worth 1 GP, shoots from the wand’s tip in a Line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide toward the chosen point of origin. Each gem deals [[/damage 1 type=bludgeoning]] damage, and the total damage of the gems is divided equally among all creatures in the Line.
translation: 在选择的源点处无事发生。取而代之的是，一股共计[[/r 1d4*10 #Gems]]颗宝石的激流（每颗价值 1 GP）从法杖的尖端向着选择的源点处以 30 尺长，5 尺宽的线状区域激射过去。每颗宝石造成[[/damage 1 type=bludgeoning]] 伤害，宝石造成的总伤害将平均分配给范围内的所有生物。

original: You cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]{Polymorph}, targeting the creature closest to the chosen point of origin. Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine the target’s new form. On a 1, the new form is a Black Bear; on a 2, the new form is a Giant Wasp; on a 3–4, the new form is a Frog.
translation: 你以选择的源点最近的生物为目标施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]。投掷 [[/r 1d4]] 来决定目标的新形态：结果为 1 时，新形态为黑熊；结果为 2 时，新形态为巨黄蜂；结果为 3-4 时，新形态为青蛙。

original: The creature closest to the chosen point of origin makes a [[/save con 15]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition and begins to turn to stone. While Restrained in this way, the creature repeats the save at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature has the &Reference[Petrified] condition instead of the Restrained condition. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell or similar magic.
translation: 离选择的源点最近的生物进行一次 [[/save con 15]] 豁免。失败时，这个生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态并开始转变为石头。当被以这种方式束缚时，目标在其下个回合结束时重复该豁免。如豁免通过则结束该效应。如豁免失败，生物陷入&Reference[Petrified] 状态来代替束缚状态。石化将持续至这个生物被 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]法术或类似的魔法所释放。

original: Wind: Light. Precipitation: Light rain or light snowfall.
translation: 风力： 轻风。降雨量： 轻度降雨或降雪。

original: Wind: Strong. Precipitation: Heavy rain or heavy snowfall.
translation: 风力： 强风。降雨量： 重度降雨或降雪。

异想天开的名：唧唧

异想天开的姓：波罗戈夫

异想天开的名：黛茜

异想天开的姓：小怯

异想天开的名：西比拉薇（坏女巫）

异想天开的姓：小怯

original: You pass through a Swarm of Insects (see the Monster Manual, with the DM choosing whichever kind of insects makes the most sense). The swarm uses one of its actions, targeting you.
translation: 你闯进了一个虫群（查阅怪物图鉴，由DM确定一种最合理的虫类），虫群使用了它的其中一个动作项，而目标是你。

original: A stream or ravine blocks your path. Make a [[/save str dc=10]] or [[/save dex dc=10]] saving throw (your choice) to cross the impediment. On a failed save, the impediment counts as 10 feet of &Reference[Difficult Terrain] for you.
translation: 一个小溪流或是地缝阻碍了你的去路，成功通过一个 [[/save str dc=10]] 或[[/save dex dc=10]] 豁免（由你决定）以跨越阻碍。若失败，这个阻碍对你而言视为10尺 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

original: Make a [[/save con dc=10]] saving throw. On a failed save, blowing sand, dirt, ash, snow, or pollen causes you to have the &Reference[Blinded] condition until the end of your turn. While you are Blinded in this way, your Speed is halved.
translation: 进行一次 [[/save con dc=10]] 豁免，如果豁免失败，吹拂而来的沙子、泥土、灰烬、雪或者花粉会导致你陷入 &Reference[Blinded] 状态，直到你的回合结束。当你因这种方式目盲时，你的速度减半。

original: A sudden drop catches you by surprise. Make a [[/save dex dc=10]] saving throw to navigate the impediment. On a failed save, you fall 10 feet.
translation: 地面突然开始向下倾斜，使你措手不及。成功通过一个 [[/save dex dc=10]] 豁免以处理这一状况，如果豁免失败，你会从 10 尺高处坠落。

original: Your path takes you near a patch of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7#razorvine]{Razorvine}. Make a [[/save dex dc=15]] saving throw or use 10 feet of movement (your choice) to avoid the razorvine. On a failed save, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=slashing]] damage.
translation: 你前方的路直直通往一片利刃藤（参考本章“ @UUID[Compendium.dnd-dungeon-masters-guide.content.JournalEntry.dmgDmsToolbox000.JournalEntryPage.lVkdQivhFHqVmxg7#razorvine]{危害}”一节）。成功通过一个 [[/save dex dc=15]] 豁免或是耗费 10 尺移动（由你选择）即可避开利刃藤。如果豁免失败，你会受到 [[/damage 1d10 type=slashing]] 伤害。

original: A creature native to the area notices you. (The DM chooses a creature appropriate for the terrain.) Make a [[/save wis dc=10]] or [[/save cha dc=10]] saving throw (your choice). On a failed save, the creature joins the chase, with you as its quarry.
translation: 这个区域的原生生物注意到了你（由DM决定一个适合该地区的生物）。进行一次 [[/save wis dc=10]] 或 [[/save cha dc=10]] 豁免（由你决定）。如果豁免失败，该生物会加入到追逐中，将你视为追捕的目标。
